name: Create attendees in ClickMeeting for new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new attendee in ClickMeeting. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15nzNdN2mn0_b8K-FTzYYUUXgoDjl_fGEBNlwr5zQI8Y/edit?usp=sharing).
